body_html:
Hi @tcmxx , it was built by bazel. Please try to follow these 2 guides:

https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/install.html
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources

And

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/windows/libtensorflow_cpu.sh
